alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Chattooga; Floyd; Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Floyd, southern Gordon, central Chattooga and northwestern Bartow Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Plainville, or 8 miles southwest of Calhoun, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rome, Calhoun, Summerville, Adairsville, Plainville, Shannon, Fairmount, Lyerly, Sonoraville, Pinson, Lindale, Oostanaula, Tidings, Armuchee, Folsom, Coosa, Berryton, Everett Springs, James H. Floyd State Park and Holland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
